sqlMap.select: SELECT item.ITEM_GROUP_CODE AS itemGroupCode, item.ITEM_PIC_PATH AS itemPicPath, item.ITEM_PIC_SAVENAME AS itemPicSavename, item.ITEM_NAME AS itemName, item.BRAND_NAME AS brandName FROM ORDERING ordering, ORDER_INFO info, (SELECT it.ITEM_GROUP_CODE, it.ITEM_CODE, it.ITEM_PIC_PATH, it.ITEM_PIC_SAVENAME, it.ITEM_NAME, br.BRAND_NAME FROM ITEM it, BRAND br WHERE it.BRAND_CODE = br.BRAND_CODE GROUP BY ITEM_GROUP_CODE) item WHERE ordering.USER_CODE=#userCode# AND ordering.ORDER_CODE=info.ORDER_CODE AND info.ORDER_ITEM_VERIFY='Y' AND item.ITEM_GROUP_CODE NOT IN (SELECT ITEM_GROUP_CODE FROM REVIEW WHERE USER_CODE=#userCode#) AND info.ITEM_CODE = item.ITEM_CODE GROUP BY item.ITEM_GROUP_CODE;
